Hotel.name: Maitrise Hotel Maida Vale (Formerly Best Western)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Maitrise Hotel in London (Maida Vale), you'll be convenient to The Tricycle Theatre and London Zoo. This 4-star hotel is close to Selfridges and Royal Albert Hall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 96 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while iPod docking stations and digital programming provide entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and designer toiletries. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility.
Make yourself at home in one of the 96 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while iPod docking stations and digital programming provide entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and designer toiletries. With a stay at Best Western Maitrise Hotel in London (Maida Vale), you'll be convenient to The Tricycle Theatre and London Zoo. This 4-star hotel is close to Selfridges and Royal Albert Hall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Tricycle Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Hampstead Theatre - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Swiss Cottage Farmers' Market - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Freud Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Lord's Cricket Ground - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Primrose Hill - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Everyman Cinemas - Hampstead - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Portobello Road Market - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Whiteleys Shopping Centre - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
London Business School - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Regent's Park - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
London Zoo - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Electric Cinema - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Burgh House - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Keats House - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 19.3 km / 12 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Maitrise Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

RoomType.text: Double Standard Room without Window + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Construction work is taking place near the hotel. Applicable from 29/Oct/2018 to 01/Dec/2019
Please note: The Hotel will require a £50 security deposit at check in for incidentals which is fully refundable at check out if paid by cash. A pre authorisation is released by the bank atomically and may take up to 14 days Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Message.Text:
³* EL HOTEL TIENE ESPACIO LIMITADO PARA GUARDAR EL EQUIPAJE EN LA RECEPCION ³POR LO QUE SE CARGARA UN PEQUE¥O IMPORTE EN CASO DE QUERER DEJARLO* ³ ³* THE HOTEL HAVE LIMITED SPACE TO KEEP THE LUGAGGE ON THE RECEPTION, ³BECAUSE OF THIS THE HOTEL WILL CHARGE A SMALL FEE TO LEAVE IT THERE*

PLEASE, NOTE THAT THE EXECUTIVE SUITE AND THE SUITE OFFER HAS NO WINDOW. POR FAVOR, TENGA EN CUENTA QUE LA SUITE EJECUTIVA Y LA SUITE OFERTA NO TIENEN VENTANA

PLEASE, NOTE THAT THE HOTEL IS PROVIDING CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST. POR FAVOR, ³TENGA EN CUENTA QUE EL HOTEL OFRECE SOLAMENTE DESAYUNO CONTINENTAL EN SUS ³INSTALACIONES.

THE HOTEL WILL REQUEST A PHOTO ID TO DO THE CHECK IN WHICH IS MANDATORY UPON ³ARRIVAL ³EL HOTEL SOLICITARA UNA IDENTIFICACION OFICIAL CON FOTO Y SERA OBLIGATORIO ³PRESENTARLO A LA LLEGADA

³PLEASE, NOTE THAT THE CARD HOLDER NEEDS TO BE PRESENT IF YOU WANT THE HOTEL ³TO CHARGE THE BANK CARD THAT WAS USED TO GUARANTEE THE BOOKING. ALTERNATIVELY³ YOU CAN BRING A SIGNED AUTHORIZATION LETTER + PHOTO ID FROM CARD HOLDER. ³POR FAVOR, TENGA EN CUENTA QUE EL TITULAR DE LA TARJETA CON LA QUE SE HA ³CONFIRMADO LA RESERVA, DEBE ESTAR PRESENTE. ALTERNATIVAMENTE, PUEDE TRAER UNA³CARTA FIRMADA POR EL MISMO AUTORIZANDOLE EL PAGO CON LA MISMA TARJETA ADEMAS ³DE UNA FOTOCOPIA DEL CARNET DE INDENTIDAD CON FOTO.

³**The Hotel will require a 50 pre authorization deposit which will be ³released upon check out by the bank automatically and may take up to 14 days*³**El hotel solicitara una pre autorizacion de 50 de la tarjeta bancaria como³deposito, que sera liberado automaticamente despues del check out. La ³transaccion podria tardar hasta 14 dias en realizarse.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

³**The Hotel will require a 50 pre authorization deposit which will be ³released upon check out by the bank automatically and may take up to 14 days*³**El hotel solicitara una pre autorizacion de 50 de la tarjeta bancaria como³deposito, que sera liberado automaticamente despues del check out. La ³transaccion podria tardar hasta 14 dias en realizarse.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

RoomType.text: Double Executive Suite without Window + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
³* EL HOTEL TIENE ESPACIO LIMITADO PARA GUARDAR EL EQUIPAJE EN LA RECEPCION ³POR LO QUE SE CARGARA UN PEQUE¥O IMPORTE EN CASO DE QUERER DEJARLO* ³ ³* THE HOTEL HAVE LIMITED SPACE TO KEEP THE LUGAGGE ON THE RECEPTION, ³BECAUSE OF THIS THE HOTEL WILL CHARGE A SMALL FEE TO LEAVE IT THERE*

PLEASE, NOTE THAT THE EXECUTIVE SUITE AND THE SUITE OFFER HAS NO WINDOW. POR FAVOR, TENGA EN CUENTA QUE LA SUITE EJECUTIVA Y LA SUITE OFERTA NO TIENEN VENTANA

PLEASE, NOTE THAT THE HOTEL IS PROVIDING CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST. POR FAVOR, ³TENGA EN CUENTA QUE EL HOTEL OFRECE SOLAMENTE DESAYUNO CONTINENTAL EN SUS ³INSTALACIONES.

THE HOTEL WILL REQUEST A PHOTO ID TO DO THE CHECK IN WHICH IS MANDATORY UPON ³ARRIVAL ³EL HOTEL SOLICITARA UNA IDENTIFICACION OFICIAL CON FOTO Y SERA OBLIGATORIO ³PRESENTARLO A LA LLEGADA

³PLEASE, NOTE THAT THE CARD HOLDER NEEDS TO BE PRESENT IF YOU WANT THE HOTEL ³TO CHARGE THE BANK CARD THAT WAS USED TO GUARANTEE THE BOOKING. ALTERNATIVELY³ YOU CAN BRING A SIGNED AUTHORIZATION LETTER + PHOTO ID FROM CARD HOLDER. ³POR FAVOR, TENGA EN CUENTA QUE EL TITULAR DE LA TARJETA CON LA QUE SE HA ³CONFIRMADO LA RESERVA, DEBE ESTAR PRESENTE. ALTERNATIVAMENTE, PUEDE TRAER UNA³CARTA FIRMADA POR EL MISMO AUTORIZANDOLE EL PAGO CON LA MISMA TARJETA ADEMAS ³DE UNA FOTOCOPIA DEL CARNET DE INDENTIDAD CON FOTO.

³**The Hotel will require a 50 pre authorization deposit which will be ³released upon check out by the bank automatically and may take up to 14 days*³**El hotel solicitara una pre autorizacion de 50 de la tarjeta bancaria como³deposito, que sera liberado automaticamente despues del check out. La ³transaccion podria tardar hasta 14 dias en realizarse.
